notes.title: Author Contributions
notes.p: M.M.M.P. conceived, wrote and revised the manuscript, while all authors gave significant contributions in writing: simple oxygenated xanthones (E.S.), prenylated xanthones (H.C., S.C.), halogenated, aminated, and carboxyxanthones (D.I.S.P.R.), sulfated and/or glycosylated xanthones (M.C.-d.-S.), chiral derivatives of xanthones (C.F. and M.E.T.), thioxanthones (A.P.). E.S. and D.I.S.P.R. gave additional support in the discussion and final revision. All authors agreed to the final version of the manuscript.
